Package com.concordia.soen6441riskgame

Class RGGraph

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.concordia.soen6441riskgame.RGGraph
  • public class RGGraph
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that implements a collection of lists not only to represent a graph but also to handle the information of continents, the game, and the players. From this perspective, same methods can be used to manipulate the information of any data structure.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Julian Beltran

    • Method Detail

      • addVertex

        void addVertex​(java.lang.String vertex)
        This method is used to create the key of the HashMap. Data Structures: 1) Map Data Structure: Key=Name of the country. 2) Countries Data Structure: Key=Name of the country. 3) Continents Data Structure: Key=Name of the continent. 4) Players Data Structure: Key=Name of the player.
        Parameters:
        vertex - Name of the key.

      • addEdge

        void addEdge​(java.lang.String vertex1,
             java.lang.String vertex2)
        This method is used to create one value for a given key. The data structure can have more than one value. For that reason, the value of the key is an ArrayList. Data Structures: 1) Map Data Structure: Values=[Set of adjacent countries]. 2) Countries Data Structure: Values=[X Coordinate, Y Coordinate, Continent, Owner, Armies]. 3) Continents Data Structure: Values=[bonus army number, Continent's counties]. 4) Players Data Structure: Values=[Turn, Color, Armies to place in setup phase].
        Parameters:
        vertex1 - Name of the key.
        vertex2 - New value to add.

      • setEdge

        void setEdge​(java.lang.String vertex,
             java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> edges)
        This method is used to replace a specific value of a given key.
        Parameters:
        vertex - Name of the key.
        edges - Complete set of values to replace.

      • getEdges

        java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getEdges​(java.lang.String vertex)
        This method returns the set of values of a given key.
        Parameters:
        vertex - Name of the key.
        Returns:
        Set of values of a given key.

      • getVertex

        java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getVertex()
        This method returns the set of keys of a given data structure.
        Returns:
        Set of keys of a given data structure.
